#summary How to add custom Providers through an XML file
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Add Providers with an XML file =

The control already comes with a number of preset providers, but it also allows you to add your own custom Providers.

In this page, I will show an example of how to add 2 new Providers via an xml file.

The XML must have the following format:

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<providers>
  <provider name="A Direct Provider">
    <image>images/directprovider.png</image>
    <url>www.providerpage.com</url>
  </provider>
  <provider name="A Username Provider">
    <image>images/usernameprovider.png</image>
    <url>www.providerpage.com/{u}</url>
  </provider>
</providers>
}}}

The Providers are then added like such:

{{{
protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) 
{
    NETOpenIDSelector1.AddProviders("xml/providers.xml");
}
}}}
